description: Developed an AI application with TypeScript, Next.js, and React, writing over 8,500 lines of code
Performed prompt engineering to automatically populate project description and research title
Pushed out major features such as a file management system, demo view, and user dashboard
Designed and implemented the database architecture of the file upload process in the MVP
Developed, tested, and built a VR virtual gallery for the artwork exhibitions using Unity
Packaged the virtual galleries into IOS and Android applications
Executed cloud hosting and cloud server migration with AWS EC2 and S3
Enforced cloud security with Trend Micro Cloud One and created backups for the website
Implemented cybersecurity measures, obtaining the CSA Cyber Essentials mark for the company
Secured partnerships and collaborations with regional stakeholders such as industrial incubators
Supported the Program Manager to design and organize events, talks and workshops
Interviewed startup founders and raised awareness for their company and Block71
Promoted the Block71 Branding at networking events, on top of forming connections with local startups and stakeholders while understanding the Indonesian market
